data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 332,652 believers in Lusaka, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Lusaka, Zambia
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 332,652 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Lusaka.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 4 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Lusaka, Zambia. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Lusaka, Zambia.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Jew, English-speaking people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Jew, English-speaking people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Jew, English-speaking people is yours.
Father, grace the churches in Lusaka, Zambia with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Lusaka, Zambia.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.section_summary:
the state of Lusaka, Zambia has a population of 1,334,600.

We estimate Lusaka has 332,652 people who might know Jesus, 821,334 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 180,614 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 1,334,600 people living in Lusaka, Zambia. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.
